scripts.dev: pnpm obelisk hello && pnpm run start-template
scripts.dev:devnet: ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network devnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet && next
scripts.dev:testnet: ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network testnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet && next
scripts.dev:docker: pnpm run localnode:docker && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network localnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && next
scripts.start-template: pnpm run localnode && sleep 5 && ts-node scripts/generateAccount.ts && pnpm obelisk faucet --network localnet && pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet && next
scripts.world-publsih-localnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-publsih-devnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-publsih-testnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-publsih-mainnet: pnpm obelisk publish --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
scripts.world-upgrade-localnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network localnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts localnet
scripts.world-upgrade-devnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network devnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts devnet
scripts.world-upgrade-testnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network testnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts testnet
scripts.world-upgrade-mainnet: pnpm obelisk upgrade --network mainnet && ts-node scripts/storeConfig.ts mainnet
